Name: Chinatris
About the game: Chinatris is a Tetris-like game about Chinese characters where you combine different Chinese character components to create new ones. To clear each stage, you must create the target characters. While playing you will meet many new and surprising characters that will give you a different look of Chinese culture. Don’t know how to pronounce a character? Don’t worry, the pronunciation will show up once you form the characters. You’ll also be able to find some very unique character designs through Steam Achievements. How many will you find? Developed by Args Studio(仓鼠动力) and Published by Gamera Game.
